title: Detailed Feature Explanations
task: Activates ALFRED to explore new features
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to explain its new features in detail, so I can learn how to use them well.

title: Open Health Data Sharing with Caregiver
task: Share health data openly with her informal caregiver Sarah
summary: As an older person, I want to share most health data freely with my informal caregiver, so I feel supported while keeping some privacy control.

title: Control Medical Staff Data Access
task: Set cautious limits on medical staff’s access to her health data
summary: As an older person, I want my health data shared with medical staff when I agree, to get good care.

title: Positive Response to Exercise Calls
task: Respond positively to video calls encouraging exercise participation
summary: As an older adult, I want to enjoy video calls for exercise challenges anytime outside scheduled care, so I stay motivated and active.

title: Spontaneous Chat with Strangers
task: Enjoy the freedom and independence enabled by ALFRED
summary: As an older adult, I want to chat freely and spontaneously with random strangers to feel less lonely and more connected.

title: Wear Comfortable Health Devices
task: Value privacy outside of hospital contexts
summary: As an older adult, I want to wear small, simple, and comfortable health devices that do not bother me and fit my daily life.

title: Spontaneous Social Chats
task: Use ALFRED to maintain social connections and emotional engagement
summary: As an older adult, I want to chat freely and spontaneously with friends and strangers to feel less lonely and more connected.

title: Challenge with Advanced Exercises
task: Use ALFRED as a supportive companion for staying active and socially connected
summary: As an older adult I want to do harder exercises to challenge myself and stay strong and motivated.

title: Continuous ALFRED presence all day
task: Enjoy the presence of ALFRED throughout the day
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to be ready to respond without action, when I enable continuous listening, so I feel supported easily.

title: Automatic Activation for Continuous Support
task: Value autonomy and continuous connection provided by ALFRED
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to activate by itself anytime to support my health so I always feel cared for without doing anything.

title: Voice Commands for Daily Tasks
task: Interact with ALFRED using voice commands to perform daily activities
summary: As an older adult, I want to use voice commands to learn and control daily tasks easily, so I can manage my day and understand the system well.

title: Persistent Exercise Reminders Acceptance
task: Respond to persistent reminders for exercises and health checks
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me often to do exercises and health checks, allowing me to adjust difficulty to stay motivated.

title: Manage Caregiver Notifications Timing
task: Experience guilt when caregivers receive notifications late at night
summary: As an older adult, I want caregivers to get urgent notifications right away, so they can help me quickly when needed.

title: Accept spontaneous exercise prompts
task: Accepts voice reminders from ALFRED to start physical and cognitive exercises
summary: As an older adult, I want to accept spontaneous voice prompts for hard exercises, so I can stay motivated and challenge myself.

title: Encourage Rest After Hard Exercises
task: Follows challenging workout prompts given by ALFRED
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest short rest times after hard exercises, so I can recover and stay challenged.

title: Spontaneous challenging exercise prompts
task: Feels motivated by the system pushing her to improve her health
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to offer occasional surprise exercise challenges, so I stay motivated and improve strength.

title: Control Exercise Scheduling
task: Experiences mixed feelings about losing some control over exercise scheduling
summary: As an older person, I want to choose my exercise time freely so I feel in control and motivated.

title: Spontaneous Social Chat
task: Enjoys the social engagement features to reduce loneliness
summary: As an older adult, I want to chat spontaneously with new people to feel less lonely and enjoy meeting others.

title: Receive detailed explanations for new exercises
task: Responds happily to ALFRED’s exercise prompts
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to explain new exercise challenges in detail so I can learn how to do them well before starting.

title: Control Exercise Timing
task: Reflects briefly on the system’s insistence on forcing activities even when wanting rest
summary: As an older adult, I want to choose when to start exercises to keep control and stay motivated.

title: Detailed Health Check-in Guidance
task: Tells ALFRED to start the health check-in
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to explain health check-in steps in detail when caregivers are not working or when I ask, so I can manage my health well.

title: Wear comfortable health wearables
task: Wears wearable devices to track vital signs
summary: As an older adult, I want to wear small, simple, and comfortable health wearables so I can use them easily and without feeling bothered.

title: Postpone Hard Exercises After Check-in
task: Chooses to postpone challenging exercises after health check-in
summary: As an older adult, I want to do hard exercises without delays, while respecting caregiver's health checks and safety recommendations.

title: Ask ALFRED for heart rate trends details
task: Asks ALFRED detailed questions about heart rate trends
summary: As an older adult, I want to ask ALFRED detailed questions about my heart rate trends so I can learn more and understand my health better.

title: Clear Explanations of Health Data
task: Requests explanations about health data in a clear way
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to explain my health data in detail, so that I can learn and understand it fully.

title: Automatic Health Alerts Activation
task: Lets ALFRED activate automatically if health condition changes suddenly
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to turn on by itself when my health changes, so I always feel safe without doing anything.

title: Informal Video Chat with Family
task: Uses ALFRED to make a video call with her daughter
summary: As an older adult, I want to make video calls with my family using informal and spontaneous language to feel close and natural.

title: Share health progress in video calls
task: Shares her health progress during video calls
summary: As an older adult, I want to share my health data during scheduled video calls, so my family knows how I am doing when I choose.

title: Negotiate Reminders for Health Appointments
task: Negotiates with ALFRED to set reminders for healthcare appointments
summary: As an older adult, I want to freely decide when and how to set reminders for my health appointments, so I feel in control and not pressured.

title: Balance support and personal freedom
task: Balances between accepting ALFRED's support and keeping personal freedom
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to offer help automatically at home outside caregiver work hours with my permission, so I stay healthy and feel safe.

title: Detailed Health Management Learning
task: Feels curious about managing her health better with ALFRED’s help
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to explain in detail how to read my health data, so I can learn to manage my health well and feel confident.

title: Respect User's Choice to Postpone Support
task: Wants ALFRED to respect her choices and not be too pushy
summary: As an older adult, I want to delay exercises or support whenever I want, so I feel free and not controlled.

title: Maintain independence from ALFRED prompts
task: Feels concerned about becoming too dependent on ALFRED’s prompts
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me gently and regularly, so I keep my health and independence.

title: Natural and informal ALFRED communication
task: Appreciates natural and easy communication with ALFRED
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to talk in a natural way using formal or informal tone, so I feel comfortable and understood.

title: Flexible Timing for Support and Reminders
task: Prefers flexible timing for receiving support and reminders
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to send exercise reminders only when I allow, so I keep control over my activities.
